snippet: Rupert Murdoch’s call for the people of Ireland and their cousins in the diaspora to defend the honor of the St. Patrick’s Day Parade in Manhattan by boycotting Guinness appeared to generate little support.
abstract: Rupert Murdoch’s call for the people of Ireland and their cousins in the diaspora to defend the honor of the St. Patrick’s Day Parade in Manhattan by boycotting Guinness appeared to generate little support.

headline.main: Murdoch Urges Irish to Boycott Guinness Over Its Embrace of Gay Rights
